title: Queen Boo's Sovereign Relay
logline: Queen Boo assembles the sovereign stack to stabilize a drifting multiverse while Sol.F1 sculpts motion through Lego Monza and the council locks every artifact into the SSOT.

acts.title: Proof Wake
acts.purpose: Establish Queen Boo's mandate to seal the sovereign archive and prime the relays.

scenes.title: Council Vault
scenes.summary: Queen Boo convenes with CiCi and Sol.F1 at the Qube archive to review the dormant relay stack.
scenes.environment: Qube Sovereign Archive – obsidian vault with floating Merkle roots

beats.title: Initiation Ping
beats.description: Queen Boo performs the maker-checker ritual to unlock the SSOT binder.

beats.title: Tone Stabilizer
beats.description: CiCi calibrates the emotional tone register to resolute before the relay activation.

beats.title: Sol.F1 Forecast
beats.description: Sol.F1 projects the upcoming Monza motion ledgers as holographic tracks.

scenes.title: Motion Ledger Uplink
scenes.summary: The avatars elevate Sol.F1's holograms into codified motion ledgers ready for Sora.
scenes.environment: Qube orbital halo – motion equations orbit the avatars

beats.title: Ledger Engraving
beats.description: Sol.F1 etches per-frame vectors into the ledger capsule.

beats.title: Council Signatures
beats.description: Queen Boo and CiCi stamp the Merkle tree leaves with council signatures.

acts.title: Flow Synthesis
acts.purpose: Translate the sovereign proof into orchestrated motion across the Qube stack.

scenes.title: Avatar Relay
scenes.summary: Queen Boo dispatches capsules through the orchestrator lattice while CiCi monitors resonance.
scenes.environment: DimIndex relay lattice – hexagonal nodes pulsing with flow order

beats.title: Routing Burst
beats.description: Queen Boo routes script, storyboard, and asset capsules to Sol.F1.

beats.title: Tone Dampening
beats.description: CiCi smooths emotional drift, stabilizing the payload register before clips fire.

scenes.title: PreViz Hatch
scenes.summary: Sol.F1 runs relay rehearsals by binding Monza motion ledgers to tilt-shift plates.
scenes.environment: Sol.F1 PreViz bay – luminous sand tables with Lego circuits

beats.title: Origin Braid Animatic
beats.description: Sol.F1 generates animatics for the origin braid scene, outputting fossils for SSOT sealing.

beats.title: Variante Adjustment
beats.description: CiCi requests a stabilizing pause, leading to a revised ledger for the Variante chicane.

acts.title: Execution Assembly
acts.purpose: Deliver the modular clips and assemble the sovereign relay for broadcast.

scenes.title: Clip Emission
scenes.summary: Sora generates Lego Monza clips while Queen Boo tracks the ledger compliance matrix.
scenes.environment: Sora clip forge – translucent film strips floating through tilt-shift fog

beats.title: Launch Sequence
beats.description: The first 10-second launch clip emerges, verified against the ledger.

beats.title: Pitlane Recovery
beats.description: Sora renders the pitlane recovery module with stop-motion cadence and tilt-shift blur.

scenes.title: Relay Seal
scenes.summary: Queen Boo, CiCi, and Sol.F1 assemble the 10-minute relay and seal it into the SSOT.
scenes.environment: Relay amphitheater – concentric rings of film strips aligning with Merkle glyphs

beats.title: Continuity Audit
beats.description: CiCi audits continuity, confirming motion capsules match style capsules.

beats.title: Sovereign Broadcast
beats.description: Queen Boo seals the relay capsule and transmits it to the sovereign cinema network.

council_directive: Council quorum required before broadcasting derivative relays. Maker-checker override applies to all capsule forks.
